title: What is Lark?
narration: Aaj hum Lark ke baare mein jaanenge ek powerful collaboration aur communication platform. Hum dekhenge ki Lark kya hai aur yeh kaise team work ko improve karta hai.

title: Lark: An Overview
content:
All-in-one collaboration platform.
Combines messaging, meetings, and docs.
Integrates calendar, task management, and more.
image_desc: Lark interface screenshot. Type: software screenshot
narration: Lark ek allinone collaboration platform hai jo messaging meetings aur documents ko ek saath laata hai. Ismein calendar task management aur bhi bahut saare features hain jo team work ko aasaan banate hain. Yeh ek seamless experience provide karta hai jisse teams efficiently collaborate kar sakte hain.

title: Key Features of Lark
content:
Unified communication: Messaging, voice & video calls.
Integrated workspace: Docs, sheets, and presentations.
Workflow automation: Streamline repetitive tasks.
Mobile-first design: Access from anywhere.
narration: Lark ke kuch important features mein unified communication shamil hai jismein messaging voice aur video calls aate hain. Iske alawa ismein integrated workspace hai jismein documents sheets aur presentations create aur share kiye ja sakte hain. Workflow automation repetitive tasks ko streamline karta hai aur mobilefirst design ki wajah se ise kahin se bhi access kiya ja sakta hai.

title: Introduction to Lark API
content:
Allows integration with other applications.
Enables automation of tasks within Lark.
Provides access to Lark's data and functionality.
image_desc: Lark API documentation page. Type: website screenshot
narration: Lark API developers ko doosre applications ke saath integrate karne ki anumati deta hai. Isse Lark ke andar tasks ko automate karna possible hota hai. API Lark ke data aur functionality tak access provide karta hai jisse custom solutions banaye ja sakte hain.

title: Lark API Capabilities
content:
**Messaging API**
Send and receive messages.
Create and manage chat groups.
Access message history.
**User and Bot API**
Manage users and bots.
Retrieve user information.
Control bot behavior.
image_desc: Lark API capabilities diagram. Type: infographic
narration: Lark API ke capabilities bahut wide hain. Messaging API se messages send aur receive kiye ja sakte hain chat groups create aur manage kiye ja sakte hain aur message history access ki ja sakti hai. User aur Bot API se users aur bots ko manage kiya ja sakta hai user information retrieve ki ja sakti hai aur bot behavior ko control kiya ja sakta hai.

title: Use Cases of Lark API
content:
Building custom integrations.
Automating workflows.
Creating chatbots for support.
Extending Lark's functionality.
image_desc: Examples of Lark API use cases. Type: illustration
narration: Lark API ke use cases mein custom integrations banana workflows ko automate karna support ke liye chatbots create karna aur Lark ki functionality ko extend karna shamil hai. Isse businesses apne specific needs ke according solutions develop kar sakte hain aur productivity improve kar sakte hain.
